entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -28.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandy Lake Airport 07:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -28.2°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -31.4°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
